documentation.text:
@title Auction Contract
 @dev This contract implements a simple auction system with the ability to create posts and place bids.

@dev Returns the owner of the contract.
 @return The address of the contract owner.

@dev Returns the balance of the contract.
 @return The balance of the contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Auction.Post storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Auction.Post storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Auction.Post storage ref)
struct Auction.Post storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev Returns an array of all posts.
 @return An array of Post structures representing all posts.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Auction.Post storage ref[] storage ref
struct Auction.Post storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev Returns the number of posts.
 @return The number of posts.

@dev Returns the sender's address.
 @return The address of the sender.

@dev Creates a bid for a specific post.
 @param _postId The ID of the post to place a bid on.

devdoc.details: This contract implements a simple auction system with the ability to create posts and place bids.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

accepteBid(uint256,uint256).details: Accepts a bid for a specific post.

params._bidId: The ID of the bid to accept.

cancelBid(uint256,uint256).details: Cancels a bid for a specific post.

params._bidId: The ID of the bid to cancel.

createBid(uint256).details: Creates a bid for a specific post.

params._postId: The ID of the post to place a bid on.

createPost(uint256,string,string).details: Creates a new post with details provided by the user.

params._hashCode: The IPFS hash code associated with the image stored in IPFS.
params._minBid: The minimum bid required for the post.

returns._0: A boolean indicating the success of the operation.

getBalance(address).details: Returns the balance of a specific address.

params._addr: The address to check the balance for.

returns._0: The balance of the specified address.

getBalanceContract().details: Returns the balance of the contract.

getBids(uint256).details: Returns an array of bids for a specific post.

params._id: The ID of the post to retrieve bids for.

returns._0: An array of Bid structures representing all bids for the specified post.

getOwnerContract().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

returns._0: The address of the contract owner.

getPostBid(uint256,uint256).details: Returns information about a specific bid for a post.

returns.time: The block number when the bid was placed.

getPosts().details: Returns an array of all posts.

returns._0: An array of Post structures representing all posts.

getPostsId(uint256).details: Returns a specific post by its ID.

params._id: The ID of the post to retrieve.

returns._0: A Post structure representing the specified post.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

totalBids(uint256).details: Returns the total number of bids for a specific post.

returns._0: The total number of bids for the specified post.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Auction Contract
